name: High-Stakes
description:
High-Stakes is a action-platformer revolving around a stout vampire confronting a mad scientist for stealing their precious artifact. 

Venture and dodge the deadly minutiae as you climb the dark walls. 

Alter the very gravity of your being to navigate through levels. 

The game is currently in Alpha and will be aiming for more levels, engaging obstacles and evolving pests. 

Build 1 and 2 contain different 'Level 1s' for pacing and teaching the player. 

If you have a spare moment after playing, please help us improve the quality of the game by providing us your feedback through this link: https://forms.gle/m59C6g8HeVD6p3oZ8

This is game is created by a team of seven in our spare time.

Credits:

Zoe Abbott and Diana Fernandes - Concept Art

Daniel Cefaratti - Narrative and Art Direction

Min Xu Huang (Jack) - Game Designer and Programmer

Samantha Rovers - Game Art and Animation

Spencer Preiditsch - Producer and Level Designer

Sophia Vogan - Game Designer and Programmer

We do not own the following placeholder art:

Backdrop (through the windows); Rat, Bat, Mechanical Spider, Gargoyle sprites; and various typefaces
